name: Scoreboard by Oregon Lottery
description:
Whether you’re new to sports betting or a seasoned veteran, you'll find an almost endless choice of professional sporting events you care about from around the globe.

We work with the world’s premier bookmakers to provide odds and thrilling wager opportunities, betting styles, and game options that are some of the best in the legal gaming industry. We are passionate about security, performance, and customer service, and we are absolutely committed to responsible gaming.

• Legal sports betting allowed within the borders of Oregon.
• 24/7 online wagering and customer support ready to help along every step of the journey.
• A host of responsible gaming tools and best practices to help players monitor their play and keep their gaming experience on track and entertaining.
• A tremendous selection of leagues and bet types as well as comprehensive Live Betting options.
• Secure, easy banking/funding and payment options you trust and expect.
• A growing menu of betting styles, consistently refreshing to provide an excellent experience.
• Fast payouts when you win.

Must be 21 to play. All wagers must take place within Oregon.
